column4: I use just isntalled gutsy but my video is extremely choppy when I scroll or drag. What should I try?
I just installed gutsy but my video is extremely choppy when I scroll or drag. What should I try?
do you have the best drivers installed ?
put your lspci listing on pastebin
not yet, but hopefully as a next step
well, the Intel drivers should be loaded correctly
are you attempting anything funny, say.. compiz-fusion ?
again, not yet. this is a fresh install. the only thing I have put on so far is google earth
put your /etc/X11/xorg.conf on pastebin as well, please
looks like the correct driver is loaded, maybe its not that great of a video card ?
it is onboard video, but I set it to 128 megs of memory, and it worked great under windows, which is why I would expect it to work well under linux
try in the forums, for other users with similar symptoms ?
I guess. Thanks for the help!
looks like everything is fine from this end....
